name: Sunken Dungeon
description:
You aren't the first, and you won't be the last, for the Sunken Dungeon calls out to all hardy enough to descend into its bottomless depths. Most come in search of the treasure held within, and for others, the glory of delving as deeply as possible and living to share their tale. Deeper and Deeper you will go, with nothing but your reflexes to defend yourself from the monsters which call this cavern their home.

Brave every floor you can handle on your downwards spiral, and relish in the loot you find within... But don't loosen up, lest you become a permanent resident in... The Sunken Dungeon.

A game by Jeremy DeVoe, Anthony Klenke, Jackson Michaels, Anthony Pascone, and Dan "Zfert" Williams.
